1139908875933687810.text:
TW: anti-autism

I cannot fathom parents who legitimately think it's okay to go on the internet and talk about how their childs autism ruined them, and that having autistic kids is like "death by 1000 cuts". You hatred of them is what's holding your kid back, not their autism.https://twitter.com/ShireenQudosi/status/1139023857912729601Â â€¦

1139908877082923013.text: Why do parents think it's okay to call their children burdens for their autism publicly on the internet? Your child will see this one day, I hope you know that. Their autism is a part of them. Despising it is despising them.

1139908878177640448.text: Also, you know, vaccines don't cause autism. But I doubt thats going to get through, because this isn't really about vaccines it's about finding something to blame for what "ruined" your kid. Its not autism that needs to be cured, it's your lack of understanding and hate.

1139911554030329867.text: Always shocking when parents show such a lack of human insight and lack of empathy, things they probably think are signs of autism.
